name: Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics
name_original: Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics
description: Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics - released in Japan as Tatakae Genshijin 3: Shuyaku wa yappari Joe & Mac (ジョー アンド マック 戦え原始人3 主役はやっぱりJOE & MAC), and in Europe as Joe & Mac 3: Lost in the Tropics - is a Super Nintendo Entertainment System video game and a sequel to Joe & Mac. It is the follow-up to Congo's Caper, the second game in the series.
